reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, with one noting it looks more expensive than its price point.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You won’t be disappointed
items.body: Chile I was the bell of the ball. I wore this to the Eiffel Tower for a dinner date with my husband. It’s stretchy the material was nice. It was sparkly and wrinkled resistance. I love the way I looked and felt in this dress. Worth the price Read more
items.author: Marinette Parkerson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money size is true to its fit.
items.body: Absolutely stunning dress it was perfect fit all the way around I received endless compliments at my Christmas party. Everybody was absolutely stunned at how beautiful and absolutely perfect. The dress fit me love it. I have not had the opportunity to wear the black one yet I ordered both hats off to the designer Read more
items.author: Carlos C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and comfortable.
items.body: Runs small. I normally wear a medium and the large fit perfect. The color and style are spot on. Very comfortable and super cute. Read more
items.author: Julie S.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars beautiful dress
items.body: I'm 5'3", 150 lbs. bought a medium. fit perfectly. top is sheer. bottom is stretchy. got tons of compliments. top has rhinestones and pearls. zips up the back, you will need someone to zip it up for you. if you have lots of upper arm go with a larger size, the sheer top does not stretch. Read more
items.author: fran

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning
items.body: Stunning dress!! True to size. Read more
items.author: Amanda Quinley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress
items.body: I got this for our Christmas party and omg I got so many compliments! It was unbelievable!!! This dress has the perfect amount of stretch and and fit like a glove! The slit is pretty high so I just made sure my legs were always crossed over. And if you are short it probably will need to be hemed up. I am 5’6 and it fit on me. It made my evening complete though! Read more
items.author: Coakley

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very high cut slit
items.body: I absolutely love the dress. It is beautiful. The sequence do come off a little bit and I am a bigger sized person. I got a 2X and it’s tight fit, but with that the slit that they put in the dress initially was way too high. it was cut all the way up to the top of my hip so with thick thighs it spreads pretty far and you could see everything so I’m putting about an inch stitch in the dress so that way the split is only to my right above my knee thigh area other than that the dress is great. It’s beautiful so for my bigger girls be prepared for that. Read more
items.author: Ashley Gleason

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price
items.body: This dress was a last minute purchase for a formal event. I would not say it is high quality but looks it. The material on the bottom is thinner than I expected and isn’t as long as pictured. The top mesh/beaded area is see through which I couldn’t tell from the pictures provided nor the reviews I saw, but easily fixed with a bodysuit underneath. There were some minor imperfections on the back around the seams, but nothing that anyone noticed. I believe it was tts, and possibly on the short side. I am 5’2, wore with small heels and I didn’t have to hold it up at all (size XL). With all that being said, this was definitely worth the price. I received so many compliments. The dress was comfortable and easy to move in. The slit was high, but not too high that I felt inappropriate. I would recommend and purchase again. Read more
items.author: William Weese

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Evening Off Shoulder Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Evening Off Shoulder Cocktail Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 65-purple, Blue 1, 65-apricot, 91013-black, 589-apricot, Blue 3, 398-purple, 498-black, 796-black, 5980-blue, 63-black, 980-blackish Green, Black 6, Black 1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
